resources.string: What’s going on in Los Santos? Don’t worry we have the inside scoop. Need a few new employees? We got the right people for you. Looking for work? We got jobs ready for you.
You looking for someone that is not afraid to get their hands dirty? You came to the right place. Contact, hire, and get the job done.
Read what has been going on in Los Santos. Check out some of the crews. Get the scoop on where the hottest events are going to be.
Looking for something to get in to? Need cash? Apply to jobs here.
Check out some amazing crews. If you are looking for a crew, this is the right place to find one.
